# **Textbook**

::: row
::: col-sm-6
### *Answering Questions with data*

The textbook for this course is free and open-source, and can be accessed here: <https://malloryb.github.io/statistics_E538/>

#### Copying or adopting the textbook

This is an open-educational resources (creative commons license). Read the [preface](https://malloryb.github.io/statistics_E538/index.html#important-notes) for more information about copying, sharing, or adopting the material.

This book was written in Rmarkdown and compiled using the bookdown package. All of the source code is available in this github repository <https://github.com/malloryb/statistics_E538>
